home.whyChooseSubtitle: Built specifically for men who want results, not complexity. Our AI technology delivers personalized skincare that actually works.
home.aiSkinAnalysisDesc: Advanced computer vision analyzes your skin in seconds, identifying issues and tracking improvements over time.
home.smartRecommendationsDesc: Get personalized product suggestions based on your skin type, concerns, and goals - no guesswork required.
home.progressTrackingDesc: Monitor your skin improvements with detailed analytics and adjust your routine for optimal results.
